about_the_game:
Unleash chaos in Golf Gambit: a mini-golf game with a twist! Golf Gambit introduces traps to the classic mini-golf experience, making every game you play with your friends fresh and exciting. Navigate your way past your opponents' lasers, ramps, tornados, and exploding barrels (and maybe even deploy a few of your own) to reach the hole in the fewest number of shots.

Traps, Traps, Traps!

Get ahead of the game with Golf Gambit's array of traps! Create a new shortcut with a well placed ramp or make mayhem for your friends with mini tornados, exploding barrels, moving obstacles and more! Choose from 20 traps during Early Access, and more than 40 traps at full launch.

Get The Whole Gang Involved

Enjoy multiplayer games with up to 8 players! Get together with up to 7 friends for a round of mini-golf that changes every time you play.

Traditional Mini-Golf Mode!

Fancy a more traditional approach to mini-golf? Simply toggle off the traps and enjoy a relaxing round or two without the explosions putting you off your game!

Multiple Maps & Courses!

Explore a variety of handcrafted courses, each offering different challenges and environments. Choose from 4 locations in Early Access, with more to come in the future!

Play Your Way!

Customise your game and play the way you want to, with multiple ways to tweak the gameplay experience to suit your preferences. In Golf Gambit, you make the rules!

short_description: Mini-golf with traps, tricks, and tornados! Deploy your traps to mess with your opponents or find a new path to a hole-in-one! Golf Gambit is a fun and frantic mini-golf party game for up to 8 players.
